name: Adobe Creative Cloud Student Discount
description: 60% off Creative Cloud All Apps ($22.99/month) for students and teachers
fullDescription: Adobe offers students and teachers 60% off Creative Cloud All Apps, including Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, and 20+ creative apps for $22.99/month.
whatTheyOffer:
- All Creative Cloud apps for $22.99/month (60% off)
- Includes Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro
- Access to 20+ creative applications
- 100GB cloud storage
- Adobe Fonts included
- First year pricing, then $29.99/month
howToGetIt:
1. Visit adobe.com/creativecloud/plans
2. Select Students & Teachers plan
3. Verify status with school-issued email or SheerID
4. Students ages 13+ at accredited schools eligible
5. Teachers and faculty at all levels eligible
keywords: Adobe, Creative Cloud, student discount, teacher discount, Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, 60% off
